name: Project N3T
description:
You play as a test subject working for the company Quanti. You have been tasked with testing out a new device called the EMFR that functions as a very powerful magnet. Your mission is to complete a series of tests all designed around magnets. You'll be faced with platform challenges and other puzzles in this short single-player experience.

Features:

You'll be equipped with a very powerful magnet capable of pulling and pushing metal objects. With this, you can move large objects out of the way and pull giant metal balls into holes to progress. Your magnet also functions as a grappling hook, allowing you to pull yourself to high places or push yourself up in the air.

As you progress through the tests, the Overseer will observe your performance and talk to you as you play. You'll get to know him, and hear the struggles he faces while working at the facility.
